description:
Course Description

Asian Cooking Class: 10 Homemade Recipes for Healthy Eating is a simple, step by step course to make quick and easy Chinese, Japanese and Filipino dishes. This course is designed for those who want to learn how to cook common takeout food and eat it in a healthier way.

Each lecture included in this course has three parts. The first part covers the 7-step process in making each dish. The second part is the cooking video, showing you how I prepared each dish at home. Each lecture ends with a ninja tip which are my notes and helpful tips to guide you when you cook.

At the end of this course, you can find a downloadable pdf file which is the list of the recipes discussed in this cooking class.

What are the requirements?

There are no special requirements to take this course. Only a passion for learning and cooking.

If you want to follow along the lectures, then you need basic kitchen utensils such as a knife, chopping board and a good quality of pan. Also, ingredients used in some of the recipes may not be available at your local grocery store or supermarket so you might want to visit an Asian store.

What am I getting from this course?

  • 10 simple and easy to make recipes for Japanese, Chinese and Filipino dishes.
  • Impress your family and friends by making the recipes for them.
  • Hassle - free food ideas to prepare for the busy
  • Make better than takeout food

Who are the target audience?

  • Anyone looking to make easy food
  • Anyone looking to eat healthier
  • Anyone who loves to cook and eat Asian food
title: Asian Cooking Class: 10 Homemade Recipes for Healthy Eating
instructors: Haamalu Limited Liability Company, Pearl Ishizaki
